text: Vony obozhnyuyutʹ bilya idoliv BOHA shcho volodiyutʹ niyakoyu potuzhnistyu ne zavdaty shkody yim abo yim vyhody, ta yak kazhutʹ, "Tse - nashi poserednyky u BOHU!" Skazhitʹ, vy informuyete BOHA shchosʹ Vin ne znaye u nebi abo zemli?" Vin glorified. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Naybilʹsh Vysokyy; daleko nahori potrebuyuchyy partneriv
